name: pRewind
description:
Set in the fast future, Atrion (the dude you play as) is surrounded by swarm of AV3 (enemy droids) and has only 6 bullets in his gun whose path he can rewind and obtain them again. Will he be able to survive ?

The player has to evade the spawning enemies while firing the 6 bullets which he can rewind.

P.S.: If you're wondering what happens to the gun after rewinding, remember that it rewinds too. Don't be lazy, remember where you were and go get it.

This is our entry for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2

CONTROLS:

MOVE: W,A,S,D

FIRE: Left Mouse Button

BULLET REWIND:R

QUIT: Alt+F4 (sorry about that)
